content.rendered:
The process of making Frozen Okra Sliced is the same as the frozen okra whole. Before packing fresh okra will be sliced by machine and washed again.

Depending on the requirements of the customer, the okra will have different thickness and size.

The fresh okra are washed and removed stem and then they are moved to sliced machine area.

Fresh okra are removed stem

Fresh okra are sliced by machine.

Fresh sliced okra are vacuum packed and  frozen at -40 to -35 degrees celsius
